original_text: By faith we understand that the universe was created by the word of God, so that what is seen was not made out of things that are visible.
korean_text: 믿음으로 모든 세계가 하나님의 말씀으로 지어진 줄을 우리가 아나니 보이는 것은 나타난 것으로 말미암아 된 것이 아니니라

sentences.original_text: that the universe was created by the word of God
was not made out of things that are visible
sentences.korean_translation: 보이는 것들로 만들어진 것이 아니라는 것입니다
